title: Earthjoy
description: She wants to save the one bird at a time.He wants to conquer the steeper the precipice, the better.Near-genius twenty-year old Revel LaVie's career aspirations stretch all the way to heaven, but are about to crash back to earth as she struggles to keep her fourth job in the same number of months. As a member of a dysfunctional wildlife team sent into the Sierra Nevada mountains to survey spotted owls, she pays a steep price to work with vitriolic Tim Bellows, whose burnt-out attitude and delusions about his Spider-manlike climbing abilities jeopardize their team.Yet, not all is barbed tongues, rope-burn, and shattered expectations. Revel's calamitous journey is feathered with the meeting of Jennuss, an enigmatic and talented painter.But there's such thing as too much company. When escaped killers 'share' their wilderness, the team's bird count could soon transform into a body count. And now, miles away from nowhere is the last place Revel wants to be...
author: Anita Swanson
